name: Curve Boosts a3CRV Strategy
description: Supplies {{token}} to [{{protocol}}](https://curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to earn stkAAVE and enhanced CRV rewards thanks to [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
